translation.en: [narrator] BKF Productions. Fun. Freedom. Family values.
translation.ja: ＢＦＫプロダクション 娯楽　自由　家族の絆

translation.en: The American tradition. And, as always, hunter approved.
translation.ja: アメリカの伝統 そして当然 ハンターのお墨付き

translation.en: Coming around the bend. Coming around broadside.
translation.ja: 止まれ　横っ腹を見せろ

translation.en: Oh! [laughs]
translation.ja: バック･フィーバー

translation.en: One shot. One kill.
translation.ja: 一発で命中だ！

translation.en: Hi. I'm Buck Ferguson.
translation.ja: バック･ファーガソンだ バック･ファーガソンだ パンテオン賞 ２度受賞

translation.en: A long time ago, I decided to follow my dream
translation.ja: パンテオン賞 ２度受賞 パンテオン賞 ２度受賞 オジロジカのハンターを 夢見た子供が今こうして オジロジカのハンターを 夢見た子供が今こうして オジロジカのハンターを 夢見た子供が今こうして ２０１２年度 ハンター賞 受賞

translation.en: of hunting whitetail deer all over the world.
translation.ja: オジロジカのハンターを 夢見た子供が今こうして ２０１２年度 ハンター賞 受賞 オジロジカのハンターを 夢見た子供が今こうして オジロジカのハンターを 夢見た子供が今こうして 〝アメリカの オジロジカハンター〞 オジロジカのハンターを 夢見た子供が今こうして

translation.en: Lo and behold, my dreams have come true.
translation.ja: 本物のハンターに なってる

translation.en: I've seen the best. And I've killed the best.
translation.ja: 何度も大物を 仕留めてきた

translation.en: And now I'm here to share with you the joy I've found in hunting whitetail deer.
translation.ja: オジロジカ狩りの 醍醐味(だいごみ)を 皆も味わってほしい

translation.en: Out of all my years hunting, that is, without a doubt,
translation.ja: これまでの獲物で― 間違いなくオジロジカが 一番すばらしい

translation.en: the most magnificent creature I've ever laid eyes on.
translation.ja: 間違いなくオジロジカが 一番すばらしい

translation.en: You see the points on that thing?
translation.ja: 立派なツノだろ？

translation.en: [whispering] Jumping Joseph!
translation.ja: すげえぞ

translation.en: Yes! Yes! Yes!
translation.ja: イエス！ 捕ったぞ！

translation.en: What...
translation.ja: あれは…

translation.en: I saw him and thought, "Might as well."
translation.ja: 予想外の収穫だ！

translation.en: I've got a few notches in my belt,
translation.ja: 数々の功績を残したが

translation.en: but tonight's episode isn't just about killing whitetail deer.
translation.ja: 今回は狩り以外の一面も 見せよう

translation.en: [Buck] It's also about family.
translation.ja: 家族との絆だ

translation.en: I suggest you gather you and yours
translation.ja: 皆も家族そろって―

translation.en: and sit back to enjoy this very special edition of Buck Fever.
translation.ja: 「バック･フィーバー」 特別版を楽しんでくれ

translation.en: [Don] Just a little more sauce on the left.
translation.ja: 少しだけ左だ

translation.en: [Buck] Little more. Okay?
translation.ja: 少しだな

translation.en: -[Don] Is that how you're gonna sit? -Mmm... Yeah.
translation.ja: 座る位置は？ ここでいい

translation.en: [Don] Then take it down a notch. Bring it down. Just a hair.
translation.ja: じゃあ 少し 下に向けてくれ

translation.en: There. Look at those beautiful peepers.
translation.ja: よし　きれいな目元だ

translation.en: That was a good idea, Buck.
translation.ja: うまくいくぞ

translation.en: You get us both in frame?
translation.ja: ２人同時に？

translation.en: I can't get both of you in the frame. I was gonna pan left and right, follow the conversation.
translation.ja: それはムリだ 話に合わせてカメラを振る

translation.en: No. That's no good, Don. Jaden and me need to be in the same frame.
translation.ja: ダメだ　２人共 同じフレームに収めろ

translation.en: [chuckles] I don’t know about that. Swingles has always been our bread and butter--
translation.ja: 俺たちのお決まりの 撮り方だぞ

translation.en: If it's a comedy bit. But this is an emotional scene.
translation.ja: ここは感動的なシーンだ

translation.en: We gotta sell the father-son relationship right off the bat.
translation.ja: 最初から 親子の絆を見せないと

translation.en: I'm up against the window. I can't get much wider.
translation.ja: ここじゃ引きで撮れない

translation.en: We gotta figure something out. If we don't have the building blocks, the audience won't know to feel the emotional crescendo
translation.ja: きちんと構成を考えないと 息子の初狩りシーンで―

translation.en: when Jaden kills his first deer. It won't work.
translation.ja: 視聴者が感動できないぞ

translation.en: Okay. Buck, it is gonna work. Okay?
translation.ja: バック　大丈夫だ

translation.en: I understand building dramatic tension as well.
translation.ja: 構成は理解してる ２人にとって―

translation.en: I know this trip means a lot to you and Jaden.
translation.ja: この旅が大切なこともな

translation.en: But believe me, everything is gonna work the way it's supposed to.
translation.ja: 俺を信じてくれ すべてうまくいく

translation.en: Raking shot.
translation.ja: トラックだ

translation.en: -What's that? -Raking shot.
translation.ja: トラック？ まず左からミラーを撮れ 息子が乗っても―

translation.en: Camera goes left by the window. Jaden gets in.
translation.ja: まず左からミラーを撮れ 息子が乗っても―

translation.en: You can see Jaden, but only my eyes.
translation.ja: 俺の目を撮り続けろ ゆっくり右に移動し―

translation.en: Slow pan dolly over to me just as I turn to look at my son.
translation.ja: 俺の目を撮り続けろ ゆっくり右に移動し― 息子を見る俺を撮れ

translation.en: Saving the reveal of your face for the button. That is genius.
translation.ja: 最後まで顔を見せないわけか

translation.en: -Try it out. -Let me see here.
translation.ja: やってみろ よし

translation.en: Wow, that is definitely gonna work.
translation.ja: こりゃいい

translation.en: -It is, isn't it? -Yes.
translation.ja: だろ？ 天才だな

translation.en: You know, Don, this will be the greatest video we've ever made.
translation.ja: ドン　過去最高の ＤＶＤになるぞ

translation.en: -No, Don, stay in the car. -Copy that.
translation.ja: 車で待ってろ 了解

translation.en: Hey, Buck. [chuckles]
translation.ja: やあ　バック

translation.en: Looks like somebody's ready to go hunting.
translation.ja: キマってるな

translation.en: -Greg? What are you doing here? -Get your butt out of the cold.
translation.ja: ここで何を？ 入って ジェイデンもすぐ来る

translation.en: Jaden's upstairs, getting ready.
translation.ja: 入って ジェイデンもすぐ来る

translation.en: I'll, uh... Whoo! Sure is nippy out there.
translation.ja: 外は寒くて凍えそうだな

translation.en: I'll get him. Make yourself at home.
translation.ja: くつろいでて

translation.en: "Make myself at home." [scoffs]
translation.ja: “くつろいで”だと？

translation.en: -Oh, hey, Buck. -Hey.
translation.ja: おはよう　バック

translation.en: I'm making breakfast. Do you want anything to eat?
translation.ja: 朝食よ　食べる？

translation.en: Oh, no, thanks, Linda. I stopped at McDonald's on the way.
translation.ja: いや いいよ マクドナルドに寄ってきた

translation.en: Oh, don't tell Jaden. He'll be mad you didn't bring him a McGriddle.
translation.ja: ジェイデンが うらやましがるわ

translation.en: [Greg] You making bacon?
translation.ja: ベーコンか？

translation.en: Man fuel. That's what I've been waiting for.
translation.ja: 朝はこれじゃないとな

translation.en: Mmm! Thank you so much.
translation.ja: 感謝してるよ

translation.en: I need to talk to you about Jaden.
translation.ja: ジェイデンだけど…

translation.en: What? What is it?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: He's been acting out a lot.
translation.ja: 最近 態度が悪いの

translation.en: If I so much as ask him about school, he gets upset and plays his video game
translation.ja: 学校のことを 聞いただけで― 不機嫌になって話もしない

translation.en: and he won't say a word to me all night.
translation.ja: 不機嫌になって話もしない

translation.en: Getting held back last year really messed with his head.
translation.ja: 留年したことが原因かしら

translation.en: [Greg] It's the teachers' fault.
translation.ja: 悪いのは教師だ

translation.en: I mean, everybody knows that Jaden's not good with tests.
translation.ja: ジェイデンは テストが苦手なんだ

translation.en: He's a visual learner, like me.
translation.ja: 視覚から学ぶタイプだ

translation.en: He's not a visual learner, Greg. He's a regular learner.
translation.ja: 違う　普通に学ぶタイプだ

translation.en: I didn't mean it that way. He's attracted to things like movies--
translation.ja: つまり映画なんかを好んで…

translation.en: He's a regular learner. Leave it alone.
translation.ja: グレッグ　口出しするな

translation.en: -Hi, Dad. -Speak of the devil. How you doing, son?
translation.ja: パパ ウワサをすれば… 元気か？

translation.en: Fine.
translation.ja: まあね

translation.en: Ready to kill your first whitetail deer?
translation.ja: 初のシカ狩りだぞ

translation.en: I'm ready to shoot something.
translation.ja: まあ 何かは撃つよ

translation.en: You bringing that guitar?
translation.ja: そのギターは？

translation.en: -No, I'm carrying it for my health. -[Linda] Jaden.
translation.ja: 腕の筋トレ用 ジェイデン

translation.en: Say goodbye to your mom and Greg.
translation.ja: “行ってきます”は？

translation.en: Just hang on real quick, fellas.
translation.ja: ちょっと待ってくれ

translation.en: I wanted to get Jaden something for his first hunting video.
translation.ja: ジェイデンに プレゼントがある

translation.en: -[Jaden] What is it? -Go on. Open it.
translation.ja: これ何？ 開けてみて

translation.en: -No way! -[chuckles]
translation.ja: ウソだろ！

translation.en: Well, that's a nice gun, but not the kind you want to take hunting.
translation.ja: いい銃だが狩りには向かない

translation.en: Why not, Buck?
translation.ja: なぜだ？

translation.en: It's overkill. Too much showboating.
translation.ja: 威力がありすぎる

translation.en: This is awesome. Banana clip. Laser sight. Matte black. Murdered out.
translation.ja: 最高だよ！ バナナクリップ レーザーサイト ツヤ消しのオールブラック

translation.en: Does it got a silencer? Nope.
translation.ja: サイレンサーは？　ないか

translation.en: This thing's a certified beast. Thanks, Greg.
translation.ja: これ 超カッコいい ありがとう

translation.en: [Greg] You got it, buddy.
translation.ja: いいんだ

translation.en: -[sighs] You remember Don, don't you? -Oh, yeah, I think so.
translation.ja: ドンは覚えてるな？ まあね

translation.en: How's it going? It's been a while, huh?
translation.ja: 元気か？　久しぶりだな

translation.en: You doing something different with your hair? A faux-hawk?
translation.ja: モヒカンヘアにしたのか？

translation.en: It used to be a fade, but now it’s a spike.
translation.ja: これはスパイキーヘア

translation.en: My hair's different, too. I used to do a buzz. I'm letting it grow out.
translation.ja: 俺は丸刈りが伸びて クルクルヘアだ

translation.en: The soft curls make my eyes pop. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 目が大きく見えるだろ

translation.en: -Don, you ready to work now? -Yeah.
translation.ja: ドン　カメラは？

translation.en: We're ready. We're rolling.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ　撮ってる

translation.en: Hey, Jaden. Look what I got for you.
translation.ja: ジェイデン プレゼントだ

translation.en: Oh, Sausage McGriddle! You know what I like.
translation.ja: マックグリドルだ さすがパパ！

translation.en: Nailed it. Perfect.
translation.ja: 思ったとおり　完璧だ

translation.en: -Let's go, boys. -[engine starts]
translation.ja: よし 出発だ

translation.en: [Don] It's beautiful country out here, Buck.
translation.ja: 大自然だな

translation.en: [Buck] It's been so long since I've been up here.
translation.ja: ああ　久しぶりに来た

translation.en: These are the same mountains where I killed my first deer.
translation.ja: 俺もここで初めて シカを射止めた

translation.en: I can't believe this day is here.
translation.ja: こんな日が来るとはな

translation.en: I hate it when places don't have Wi-Fi. That's my Achilles' heel.
translation.ja: Wi-Fiがつながらない 最悪じゃん

translation.en: Wireless access will be the least of your worries
translation.ja: 今に気にならなくなるさ

translation.en: when you're on your first whitetail deer hunt.
translation.ja: なんたって初のシカ狩りだ

translation.en: -Goddamn right. -Whoo! That's what I'm talking about.
translation.ja: クソ楽しみだ！ 下品な言葉も大歓迎 だから女は留守番だ

translation.en: Colorful language. That's why we leave the women home.
translation.ja: 下品な言葉も大歓迎 だから女は留守番だ

translation.en: [laughs] The only women coming on this trip...
translation.ja: 連れてくるのは お姉ちゃんたちだけ

translation.en: Rosy Palmer and her five sisters. Look out!
translation.ja: 連れてくるのは お姉ちゃんたちだけ 分かるか？

translation.en: -Whacking off! -All right, Don.
translation.ja: オカズさ やめろ

translation.en: Tuggin' on your tallywhacker.
translation.ja: ムスコ用のな

translation.en: -[Buck] That's enough. -Pulling out our wieners and jacking off.
translation.ja: もうよせ ウィンナーをシコシコ

translation.en: -Hey! Hey! -The whack-off weekend with--
translation.ja: おい！

translation.en: We talked about that sexual stuff. Stop it.
translation.ja: 言ったろ　下ネタはよせ

translation.en: [Don] Come on, Buck! You want some?
translation.ja: バック　遅いぞ

translation.en: -Smoke him, Dad! -You bet I will!
translation.ja: 追い抜いてよ 任せとけ

translation.en: [Don] Come on, Buck!
translation.ja: いいぞ　バック

translation.en: [Buck] While we're waiting for the deer, start popping off some of that B-roll.
translation.ja: ドン　シカを待つ間に 別シーンを撮ろう

translation.en: [Don] Copy that.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: And remember, Don.
translation.ja: いいか ドン

translation.en: Fly on the wall with the camera. Me and Jaden are here to bond. That can't happen if you...
translation.ja: お前は気配を消せ 親子の絆作りの邪魔は…

translation.en: I'll buzz off. Got it.
translation.ja: 絶対しない

translation.en: All right. Great. Where's Jaden?
translation.ja: 頼むぞ　ジェイデンは？

translation.en: He's down there on the phone, yip-yapping.
translation.ja: 電話でおしゃべり中

translation.en: [Buck] Hey! Jaden!
translation.ja: ジェイデン

translation.en: -Come on. You can call 'em back. -Gotta go. Bye.
translation.ja: 後でかけ直せ

translation.en: [Buck] Who were you talking to?
translation.ja: 誰と話してた？

translation.en: My girlfriend.
translation.ja: カノジョ

translation.en: And she's mad at me now, by the way.
translation.ja: パパのせいで怒ってる

translation.en: -Thanks. -Why?
translation.ja: パパのせいで怒ってる 何で？

translation.en: Because I had to get off the phone, and she can't talk later.
translation.ja: 電話を切ったからだよ

translation.en: Don't worry about that right now. Come on.
translation.ja: 今は そんなこと忘れろ

translation.en: Hey, Don. Roll camera.
translation.ja: ドン　回せ

translation.en: Hold up.
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: All right. Good.
translation.ja: よし　これでいい

translation.en: All right. Fly on the wall. I'm not here. Go.
translation.ja: 始めよう 俺はここにいないぞ よし

translation.en: Why don't you have a seat next to me? I wanna give you something.
translation.ja: パパの隣に座れ 渡すものがある

translation.en: What is it?
translation.ja: それ何？

translation.en: Open it, son.
translation.ja: 開けてみろ

translation.en: An old gun.
translation.ja: 古い銃だ

translation.en: Not just any old gun. It's a Winchester .30-30.
translation.ja: ただの銃じゃないぞ ウィンチェスターだ

translation.en: That rifle belonged to your grandfather.
translation.ja: おじいちゃんの銃を―

translation.en: My father passed it down to me when I went on my first deer hunt.
translation.ja: 初めての狩りで パパが譲り受けた

translation.en: Today, I'm giving it to you.
translation.ja: 今日はこれをお前にやる

translation.en: I'm passing down this lever-action rifle to you, -as I'm passing down the whitetail legacy. -Boom!
translation.ja: オジロジカの伝統と共に この銃を引き継ぐんだ

translation.en: So now I got two guns.
translation.ja: これで銃が２丁だ

translation.en: Jaden, please, I'm trying to share something with you, son.
translation.ja: おい　ジェイデン 大事な話の途中だぞ

translation.en: My bad. Continue.
translation.ja: ごめん　続けて

translation.en: This rifle symbolizes the bond of family.
translation.ja: この銃は家族の絆の象徴だ

translation.en: Fathers teaching their sons to hunt is a rite of passage as old as time.
translation.ja: 父親は息子に 伝統の狩りを教える

translation.en: With this rifle comes great responsibility.
translation.ja: この銃には大きな責任が伴う

translation.en: And what we're doing out here is learning to be a man.
translation.ja: 大人になることを学ぶんだ

translation.en: When you see your first whitetail deer, it'll look cute and fluffy,
translation.ja: オジロジカは確かに フワフワでかわいい

translation.en: but you can't get into those feelings.
translation.ja: だがその気持ちは忘れ―

translation.en: We can honor the deer, but we can't love it.
translation.ja: 代わりに尊敬の念を持て

translation.en: I'll honor the deer by splitting his dang eyebrows.
translation.ja: 尊敬しながら ぶっ放すよ

translation.en: -Can I offer one criticism here? -Well, sure, son.
translation.ja: ひと言いい？ いいとも

translation.en: The one thing that Greg's gun has over this one is a laser sight. That's the one thing.
translation.ja: グレッグの銃の勝ちだ レーザーサイト付きだもん

translation.en: Is it possible to take off the laser sight from Greg's gun
translation.ja: レーザーサイトを 取り外して―

translation.en: and screw it on this old gun?
translation.ja: これに付けられる？

translation.en: Or just think of this one as a backup?
translation.ja: こっちは予備？

translation.en: Let's cut, Don. I think we got that.
translation.ja: カットだ もう撮れただろ

translation.en: [whispering] Jaden. Jaden.
translation.ja: ジェイデン おい

translation.en: Put those away and help me look for this deer.
translation.ja: 狩りに集中しろ

translation.en: Let me finish this track. This is my favorite song.
translation.ja: 少し待ってよ この曲 好きなんだ

translation.en: -Now. -[sighs] Fine.
translation.ja: ダメだ 分かったよ

translation.en: I'm hungry. You know what I could go for? Turkey panini. Paninis are good.
translation.ja: お腹すいた ターキー･パニーニがいい パニーニ最高

translation.en: We've been out here 20 minutes. Have patience.
translation.ja: 始めて まだ20分だぞ

translation.en: I am patient. But I'm starting to get hungry.
translation.ja: でもお腹がすいたんだ

translation.en: [sighs] I haven't even got to shoot my gun. I thought we'd be straight killing stuff the whole time.
translation.ja: 狩りってもっと 撃ちまくるのかと思った

translation.en: -This is boring. -Okay.
translation.ja: マジで退屈

translation.en: We are gonna shoot the guns. Hunting's about more than just killing. It's about patience.
translation.ja: 銃も撃つが 狩りには忍耐も必要なんだ

translation.en: Can I call Caroline and tell her that I can't call her?
translation.ja: キャロラインに 電話していい？

translation.en: So she won't worry.
translation.ja: きっと心配してる

translation.en: No. Caroline will be fine. Focus on the deer.
translation.ja: カノジョはいいから集中しろ

translation.en: [loudly] What deer?
translation.ja: いないじゃん

translation.en: -[whispering] Whitetail. Jaden, whitetail. -Where?
translation.ja: オジロジカだ　見ろ どこ？

translation.en: Across that field there.
translation.ja: 奥のほうだ

translation.en: [Jaden] I see it.
translation.ja: ほんとだ　すごい！

translation.en: -This is awesome. -Go get your rifle.
translation.ja: 銃を構えろ

translation.en: Do you see that? Amazing.
translation.ja: 見えるか？

translation.en: That is a nice first deer.
translation.ja: 最高の初獲物になる

translation.en: -What are you doing with that thing? -Fixing to shoot this dang deer.
translation.ja: 何してる？ 狙いを定めてる

translation.en: Put down Greg's gun and get your grandfather's rifle! Fine. Dang.
translation.ja: さっきの銃を使え グレッグのは強烈だ

translation.en: Right there.
translation.ja: あそこだ

translation.en: Should I go ahead and punch the time card?
translation.ja: もう撃っていい？

translation.en: No, not yet. Just keep him in your sights.
translation.ja: まだだ　目を離すなよ

translation.en: I will.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: [whispering] There it is.
translation.ja: 来たぞ

translation.en: [Jaden] Drop him now?
translation.ja: 撃つよ

translation.en: No, not yet. Wait until he stops.
translation.ja: 待て　止まってからだ

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: Oh, my God! I can't believe this moment is here.
translation.ja: すごいぞ ついに この時が来た

translation.en: Take the shot.
translation.ja: 撃て

translation.en: What the hell is that?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: Caroline.
translation.ja: キャロライン

translation.en: Because you were supposed to call me back! Nothing. What are you doing?
translation.ja: そっちが電話しろよ 別に　何してるの？

translation.en: Swimming? That's cool.
translation.ja: プール？　いいね

translation.en: I'll ask my dad if I can come over later.
translation.ja: あとで行けるかパパに聞く

translation.en: Actually, no, I'm not.
translation.ja: 意味分かんない

translation.en: It's just weird.
translation.ja: そんなの変だ

translation.en: If you don't like him, why would you wanna go? That's what I don't get.
translation.ja: そいつが嫌いなら 何で行くんだ

translation.ja: この旅が終わったら 少し休みたい

translation.en: What? Time off?
translation.ja: 休む？

translation.en: Yeah, you know, I told you about Kimberly's parents' farm.
translation.ja: キンバリーの 実家の話をしたろ？

translation.en: We were thinking maybe going up there,
translation.ja: しばらく住んで 向こうの暮らしが―

translation.en: spend a little time, uh, hang out there. See how it fits us.
translation.ja: しばらく住んで 向こうの暮らしが― 合うかどうか確かめたい

translation.en: But we got Washington next month.
translation.ja: 来月はワシントンだぞ

translation.en: That's the thing. I was thinking maybe you go up alone and I sit this one out.
translation.ja: それは お前１人で 行くってのはどうだ

translation.en: But we gotta shoot Buck Ferguson Takes On the Great Northwest.
translation.ja: 「北西部編」の撮影は どうするんだ

translation.en: Well, Buck, to be honest, Kimberly's getting sick of me leaving all the time.
translation.ja: 実はキンバリーが 俺の留守をイヤがって―

translation.en: She's throwing around the "R" word.
translation.ja: “リ”の付く言葉を持ち出す

translation.en: What's that word?
translation.ja: 何だ？

translation.en: Retirement. She thinks I should be retiring.
translation.ja: “リタイア”さ 引退しろって

translation.en: I can't believe you're choosing now to bring this up. Don't you think I got enough to worry about with Jaden?
translation.ja: 今する話か？　息子のことで 頭が一杯だってのに

translation.en: Yeah, of course I do. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 分かってるよ

translation.en: Look, you and me have done things the world is gonna remember.
translation.ja: ２人で皆の記憶に残る 仕事をしてきた

translation.en: I've done them, but you videotaped me doing them.
translation.ja: 正確には俺だがな これまでの作品を 見捨てるのか？

translation.en: You wanna throw that all away?
translation.ja: これまでの作品を 見捨てるのか？

translation.en: No, Buck. I never said I want to throw them away. I...
translation.ja: 違う　そうは言ってないよ

translation.en: This isn't really that thought out of an idea. It was just something she was pushing on me.
translation.ja: キンバリーが 言い出したことだが…

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I can't allow it.
translation.ja: 悪いが認めないぞ

translation.en: Your dream of watching TV all day long is gonna have to wait.
translation.ja: テレビ漬けの生活はお預けだ

translation.en: I need all hands on deck right now.
translation.ja: 今はバリバリ働け

translation.en: Yeah. No. Of course you do. We're in the middle of it, so, yeah.
translation.ja: ああ そうだよな 撮影もまだある

translation.en: Maybe we can agree to discuss this at a later date.
translation.ja: この話は またの機会にしよう

translation.en: -How about that? -Yeah. I don't know, Don.
translation.ja: どうだろうな

translation.en: Maybe in a year or so. But probably not.
translation.ja: １年後か 永久にしないか

translation.en: [chuckles] Sounds good. Just forget I even said anything about it.
translation.ja: 分かった　今のは忘れてくれ

translation.en: [Don] Hey, look what I found.
translation.ja: おい　これ見ろよ

translation.en: Keep moving.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: Be careful. You're gonna hurt yourself.
translation.ja: おい　ケガするぞ

translation.en: I'm not. I'm trained for this. Greg set me up with parkour lessons.
translation.ja: パルクール習ってるから 大丈夫

translation.en: I thought you were taking karate. We agreed on karate.
translation.ja: 空手はどうした？

translation.en: It was too hard, so I quit.
translation.ja: キツいからやめた

translation.en: Well, it takes time to learn something, son.
translation.ja: 習得には時間がかかるんだ

translation.en: You can't just go around quitting stuff 'cause it's hard.
translation.ja: そんな理由でやめるな

translation.en: [Jaden] That's not what Greg says.
translation.ja: グレッグが言ってた

translation.en: Greg says if you don't like doing something,
translation.ja: “イヤなら続ける必要ない”

translation.en: there ain't no reason to do it. And it's totally cool to quit.
translation.ja: “イヤなら続ける必要ない” “やめていい”って

translation.en: Well, that's a terrible lesson. No wonder you got held back.
translation.ja: ひどい教えだな だから留年するんだ

translation.en: Greg says it was the teacher's fault.
translation.ja: グレッグは先生が悪いって

translation.en: Greg's only telling you what you wanna hear because he wants to suck up and not hurt your feelings.
translation.ja: お前に気に入られようとして 言ってるんだ

translation.en: Trust me when I tell you that when you get a little older,
translation.ja: もう少し大きくなったら―

translation.en: you won't think gymnastics are cool anymore.
translation.ja: 体操なんてバカらしくなる

translation.en: I told you, it's not gymnastics, it's parkour--
translation.ja: 体操じゃなくてパルクール…

translation.en: Oh, you're okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だろ

translation.en: No, I'm not. My leg's getting ready to seize up on me.
translation.ja: 足が痛くて動けないかも

translation.en: That's why I told you stop playing around on the rocks. Get up.
translation.ja: 忠告を聞かないからだ 行くぞ

translation.en: Let me catch my breath for a second.
translation.ja: ちょっと休ませてよ

translation.en: -Is your leg hurting or are you tired? -Both. Dang.
translation.ja: 疲れただけだろ？ 足も痛いよ！

translation.en: Okay, we lost the whole morning already.
translation.ja: 午前中もムダにしたんだぞ 早くしろ

translation.en: -Daylight's burning here. -But, Dad, my leg's fixing to die.
translation.ja: 午前中もムダにしたんだぞ 早くしろ 足がヤバいんだってば

translation.en: [Don] Oh, you shit bird!
translation.ja: クソ　何だよ

translation.en: [Buck] You all right, Don?
translation.ja: 大丈夫か？

translation.en: [sighs] I slipped on this damn rock and hit my darn head.
translation.ja: コケて頭を打った

translation.en: Maybe it is a good time to stop for lunch.
translation.ja: ついでに昼メシにするか

translation.en: Yeah, let's make camp. Sounds like a good idea.
translation.ja: 昼メシか　いいアイデアだ

translation.en: Good, 'cause my blood sugar's running low.
translation.ja: ちょうど糖分が欲しかった

translation.en: Oh, shit, am I bleeding?
translation.ja: 出血してる？

translation.en: Hey, Jaden, where's your daddy?
translation.ja: ジェイデン パパはどこだ？

translation.en: -Making sandwiches. -You ain't hungry?
translation.ja: サンドイッチ作り お腹は？

translation.en: I am hungry. But I'm gonna put my hunger pangs into my music.
translation.ja: 空腹の苦しみを 曲作りに注ぐんだ

translation.en: Oh, uh-oh. What's wrong?
translation.ja: 何かあったか？

translation.en: I could tell you, but you would never understand.
translation.ja: 言っても分からないよ

translation.en: Oh, you might be surprised what old Don understands.
translation.ja: ドンおじさんは 何でも分かるぞ

translation.en: -[lighter clicks] -You smoke?
translation.ja: 吸うの？

translation.en: Hell, yeah, I do. Don't tell your dad, though.
translation.ja: ああ　吸うぞ 内緒だぞ シカがイヤがるんだとさ

translation.en: Thinks it scares away the deer.
translation.ja: 内緒だぞ シカがイヤがるんだとさ

translation.en: Can I get a toke?
translation.ja: 吸わせて

translation.en: There you go, Biggin.
translation.ja: お前には早い

translation.en: I wish my dad was more chill like you.
translation.ja: パパもドンみたいなら いいのに

translation.en: Your dad is definitely not the easiest fella to get along with.
translation.ja: パパは気難しいからな

translation.en: He does put a lot of pressure on himself.
translation.ja: 自分に プレッシャーをかけて―

translation.en: I think that's his drive to become the world's best hunter.
translation.ja: 自分に プレッシャーをかけて― 一流のハンターになった男だ

translation.en: I can remember the first video I made with your dad.
translation.ja: 最初の撮影をよく覚えてる

translation.en: We were up in Michigan, and I was not prepared for the weather.
translation.ja: ミシガンに行ったんだが 俺が不用意でな

translation.en: That first day it had snowed ten inches and I'd forgotten my waterproof boots.
translation.ja: 大雪だったのに 防水ブーツを忘れた

translation.en: I turned to your dad and said,
translation.ja: たまらずバックに 引き返そうと頼んだが―

translation.en: "Please, Buck, let's turn back. Let's go home. Let's get out of here."
translation.ja: たまらずバックに 引き返そうと頼んだが― あいつは聞き入れなかった

translation.en: But he wasn't hearing it.
translation.ja: あいつは聞き入れなかった

translation.en: He sat me down. He was like,
translation.ja: こう言ったんだ

translation.en: "Don, do you know what kind of pressure I'm under? Do you?
translation.ja: “ドン　俺のプレッシャーが 分かるか？”

translation.en: Every single person thinks that Buck Ferguson gets his deer every single time, and I won't turn back until I do."
translation.ja: “視聴者の期待に応えるまで 絶対に帰れない”とね

translation.en: -What'd you do? -What do you think I did?
translation.ja: それで？ 黙ってあいつに ついてった

translation.en: Sucked it up.
translation.ja: 黙ってあいつに ついてった

translation.en: We stayed out there for another three days and damn if your dad wasn't right.
translation.ja: 結局４日間 雪の中でねばったよ

translation.en: He caught himself a nice 12 pointer,
translation.ja: そして見事なシカを射止めた

translation.en: and we made one of the best videos we've ever made.
translation.ja: そのＤＶＤは今も人気だ

translation.en: What about your feet?
translation.ja: でも足は？

translation.en: I lost my big toe to frostbite.
translation.ja: 凍傷で親指を失った

translation.en: You lost a toe?
translation.ja: 指がないの？

translation.en: Yes, I did. Yep. Got a little bit of a balance issue because of it.
translation.ja: ああ　そのせいで バランスが取りづらい

translation.en: That's not really the takeaway. The point of the story is your dad is under a lot of pressure.
translation.ja: とにかく あいつは プレッシャーの中で戦ってる

translation.en: You can understand being under pressure, right?
translation.ja: 大変だって分かるだろ？

translation.en: I guess.
translation.ja: まあね

translation.en: Don, why does my dad hate me?
translation.ja: 何でパパは僕を嫌うの？

translation.en: Hate you? Oh, come on. You don't believe that.
translation.ja: 嫌う？ それ本気じゃないよな？

translation.en: Your dad is tough to get along with, but he loves you.
translation.ja: バックは ああ見えて お前を愛してる

translation.en: These last two years have just been tough on him.
translation.ja: この２年 苦しんでた

translation.en: That divorce did a real number on his head.
translation.ja: 離婚がこたえたんだ

translation.en: I think he believes this trip is gonna somehow fix it.
translation.ja: この旅で 絆を取り戻そうとしてる

translation.en: Well, I wish he'd care less about me killing a deer
translation.ja: 僕のシカ狩りに 執着するより―

translation.en: and more about giving me back my dang phone.
translation.ja: 早く携帯を返してほしいよ

translation.en: Caroline's probably worried sick.
translation.ja: キャロラインが心配してる

translation.en: I can relate to that.
translation.ja: 分かるよ

translation.en: If I don't call Kimberly every now and then, she definitely puts my ass in the damn doghouse. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 俺も電話しないと キンバリーにお仕置きされる

translation.en: I wish there was some way I could let her know I'm okay.
translation.ja: 僕の無事くらい伝えたいな

translation.en: That's all I want for her right now.
translation.ja: それだけでいいんだ

translation.en: -You ready, buddy? -[Jaden] I'm ready.
translation.ja: いくぞ？ うん

translation.en: -Are you filming? Is it rolling? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 撮れてるか？ 大丈夫　撮れてる

translation.en: Here we go. Hoverboard city.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　撮れてる ホバーボードだ

translation.en: -[Jaden] Don't be scared. -I ain't scared.
translation.ja: ビビってる？ 骨折したら困るからな

translation.en: Just don't wanna break my neck. Thanks for the ride, buddy!
translation.ja: 骨折したら困るからな 回ってるぞ

translation.en: Hey, Buck, what you doing? What you up to?
translation.ja: バック　何してるんだ？

translation.en: Just looking for the shortest course to the top of this mountain.
translation.ja: 頂上までの 最短ルートを調べてる

translation.en: Oh, that's great.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: Lunch is gonna get cold. Where's Jaden?
translation.ja: メシが冷めるぞ ジェイデンは？

translation.en: Don, look at me. Where's my son?
translation.ja: 俺の目を見ろ ジェイデンは？

translation.en: [clears throat] He's, uh, talking with his girlfriend.
translation.ja: カノジョと電話中だ

translation.en: No, he's not. I took his phone away.
translation.ja: 携帯は俺が没収した

translation.en: I let him borrow mine. So he's...
translation.ja: 俺のを貸したんだ

translation.en: -You did what? -I let him borrow my phone.
translation.ja: 何だと？ いいだろ？ 本気で電話したがってた

translation.en: It was the right thing to do. He really wanted to speak with her.
translation.ja: いいだろ？ 本気で電話したがってた

translation.en: I took that away from him so he'd focus on this trip. How could you do that?
translation.ja: 取り上げた意味が なくなるだろ

translation.en: I guess I'm just a believer in true love.
translation.ja: 真実の愛は 応援してやらないと

translation.en: He is really torn up about this girl and I didn't think it was right--
translation.ja: 本気でカノジョを 心配してたし…

translation.en: Don! Stop it! I'm his father.
translation.ja: やめろ　父親は俺だ

translation.en: I know what's best for him, and I'd take it kindly if you would not undercut my authority again.
translation.ja: あいつは俺がしつける 父親の面目をつぶすな

translation.en: Copy that.
translation.ja: 了解

translation.en: Nothing is going the way it's supposed to.
translation.ja: 何もうまくいかない

translation.en: I cooked this nice meal. The whole thing's gonna go to waste, just like this trip.
translation.ja: 昼メシだってムダになる この旅と同じさ

translation.en: And now, I get to go be the bad guy again.
translation.ja: それに また悪者にされた

translation.en: Thanks a lot, Don.
translation.ja: ありがとよ

translation.en: Jaden!
translation.ja: ジェイデン

translation.en: Jaden!
translation.ja: ジェイデン！

translation.en: What did I tell you, son?
translation.ja: 電話は禁止だぞ

translation.en: No phone calls until after this trip and you disobeyed me.
translation.ja: パパの言いつけを 破ったのか？

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
translation.ja: 言い訳できるのか？

translation.en: What do you have to say for yourself?
translation.ja: 言ってみろ　ジェイデン

translation.en: Caroline broke up with me.
translation.ja: キャロラインにフラれた

translation.en: What happened?
translation.ja: なぜだ？

translation.en: She went to this middle school dance,
translation.ja: 彼女 学校のパーティーに 行ったんだ

translation.en: which everyone knows is a recipe for disaster.
translation.ja: 彼女 学校のパーティーに 行ったんだ それが災いの始まり

translation.en: Now she says she doesn't want to date someone in elementary school.
translation.ja: 小学生はイヤだって 言い始めた

translation.en: That's ridiculous. You two are the same age.
translation.ja: バカな　同級生だろ

translation.en: That's what I told her.
translation.ja: 僕もそう言った

translation.en: Well, are you doing okay?
translation.ja: そうか　大丈夫か？

translation.en: I'm fine. She's the one being stupid.
translation.ja: うん　あっちが悪いんだ

translation.en: She's being so dumb right now I can barely stand it.
translation.ja: あんなバカ お断りだ

translation.en: I hate being in elementary school.
translation.ja: 小学校なんてイヤだ

translation.en: Look, Jaden...
translation.ja: ジェイデン

translation.en: I know you like this girl, but let me tell you something.
translation.ja: 彼女のことが好きなのは 分かるが―

translation.en: There is nothing wrong with you.
translation.ja: お前は何も悪くない

translation.en: If Caroline or whatever her name is
translation.ja: 中身を見ようとしない女は

translation.en: can't appreciate you for who you are, then she does not deserve you.
translation.ja: 誰だろうが お前にふさわしくない

translation.en: Is that why you and Mom got a divorce?
translation.ja: 離婚の原因と同じ？

translation.en: Yeah. There were some other things.
translation.ja: まあな 他にもあるがな

translation.en: It started in '09. DVD sales were down slightly.
translation.ja: 2009年にＤＶＤの 売り上げが少し落ちた時―

translation.en: Your mom was proving through this whole thing to be a terribly selfish woman.
translation.ja: ママの自分勝手さが よく分かったんだ

translation.en: She just had to give up her lavish lifestyle,
translation.ja: 買い物三昧(ざんまい)の ぜいたくな暮らしをやめず

translation.en: trips to the mall, that sort of thing, and then she just went crazy.
translation.ja: 買い物三昧(ざんまい)の ぜいたくな暮らしをやめず おかしくなっていった

translation.en: Just started acting out.
translation.ja: ヒスを起こしたりな そんな時―

translation.en: Around that time, Greg just kind of weaseled his way in
translation.ja: ヒスを起こしたりな そんな時― グレッグが割り込んできて 俺から家族を奪った

translation.en: and basically stole my family out from me.
translation.ja: グレッグが割り込んできて 俺から家族を奪った

translation.en: It's funny hearing both sides.
translation.ja: ママと言い分が違う

translation.en: Why? How do you mean?
translation.ja: そうなのか？

translation.en: Mom said that you were always out hunting.
translation.ja: パパは狩りばかりで―

translation.en: And when you weren't hunting, you'd sit around drinking. Kinda checked out, like.
translation.ja: たまに家にいる時は ずっとお酒飲んでたって

translation.en: She said whenever she tried to discuss it,
translation.ja: パパが話をしないから―

translation.en: you'd shut her down and leave her no choice but to leave.
translation.ja: ママは家を出るしかなかった

translation.en: She said that?
translation.ja: そう言ったのか？

translation.en: She also said that it was the hardest thing she ever had to do.
translation.ja: 人生で一番つらい 決断だったって

translation.en: You know why I love hunting?
translation.ja: 狩りはいいぞ

translation.en: Because when you're out in these woods, there's nothing to disturb you.
translation.ja: 森の中では― 何にも邪魔されない

translation.en: Back home, the outside world has a way of just barging in on your life
translation.ja: だが家に戻ると そうはいかない 他人に土足で 踏み込まれても―

translation.en: and just screwing everything up.
translation.ja: 他人に土足で 踏み込まれても―

translation.en: It makes a man feel powerless.
translation.ja: どうすることもできない だが森は…

translation.en: But out here, all your cares just kind of melt away.
translation.ja: どうすることもできない だが森は… すべての悩みが消えていく

translation.en: When you find a deer,
translation.ja: シカを見つけ

translation.en: and you bear down on that deer with your rifle,
translation.ja: そいつを銃で仕留めると

translation.en: and you fulfill your rightful place in nature for one moment,
translation.ja: 一瞬だが自然の中の 自分の居場所に帰れる

translation.en: that power is restored.
translation.ja: 力を取り戻せるんだ

translation.en: Everything just falls into place.
translation.ja: すべてがうまく収まる

translation.en: I could sure use that right about now.
translation.ja: 僕も早く味わいたい

translation.en: Oh, your time is coming, son.
translation.ja: すぐ味わえるさ

translation.en: When you take that monster buck we've been tracking,
translation.ja: あのレアジカを 仕留めれば―

translation.en: everything will make sense, I promise.
translation.ja: パパの話が理解できる

translation.en: I wish I didn't have to wait,
translation.ja: できれば今すぐ ストレスを消したい

translation.en: 'cause I'm carrying a lot of stress, especially in my back.
translation.ja: できれば今すぐ ストレスを消したい 特に背中の

translation.en: Come with me, son. Grab that ax.
translation.ja: 行くぞ　ギター忘れるな

translation.en: [Buck] Whoa! Look at this.
translation.ja: 見ろよ

translation.en: [Buck] This rope bridge will save us time for sure.
translation.ja: このつり橋は使えるぞ

translation.en: [Jaden] Whoa! Look down there.
translation.ja: 下 見てよ

translation.en: -[Buck] Here we go. -[Don] There you go.
translation.ja: 行くか そうだな

translation.en: I'll go first to test it.
translation.ja: 俺が先に行くよ

translation.en: Just make myself feel better.
translation.ja: 安全を確かめないとな

translation.en: -Long way down, Buck. [chuckles] -Yeah.
translation.ja: すごい高さだぞ

translation.en: [Don] We good?
translation.ja: いいか？

translation.en: -You got me? -Yeah.
translation.ja: カメラは？ 回してる

translation.en: -I'm on the edge of frame? -Got you framed up.
translation.ja: 撮れてるな？ バッチリだ

translation.en: [laughs] Look at that.
translation.ja: すごいな

translation.en: -[chuckles] -Whoo! Here we go.
translation.ja: 行くぞ！

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: -You all right? -You got it. Yeah.
translation.ja: いいか？ どうぞ

translation.en: All right.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: -Here we go. -[Don] Here we go.
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: You know what I'm thinking, Don?
translation.ja: そうだ　ドン

translation.en: You should cover this stuff from the other side of the bridge.
translation.ja: 向こう側から俺を撮ってくれ

translation.en: It's hard to see my face shooting from here.
translation.ja: ここからじゃ顔が映らない

translation.en: -Uh, how am I supposed to get-- -No.
translation.ja: 向こう側って… 分かるだろ？　そのほうが 表情をとらえやすい

translation.en: You know what I'm talking about? Capturing the emotion on my face better?
translation.ja: 分かるだろ？　そのほうが 表情をとらえやすい

translation.en: Yeah, no, I understand.
translation.ja: つまり俺が先に 渡るってことだよな

translation.en: -You want me to cross the bridge first... -Yeah.
translation.ja: つまり俺が先に 渡るってことだよな そうだ

translation.en: ...so I get coverage of you testing out the bridge before anybody crosses it,
translation.ja: 危険を顧みず 最初に橋を渡るお前を―

translation.en: -because it's unsafe. -Exactly.
translation.ja: 向こうから撮る そうだ　表情がよく撮れる

translation.en: I much prefer the joy and solitude of good old Mother Nature.
translation.ja: 母なる自然に抱かれ 喜びを感じたい

translation.en: Not that it would be all smiles and meditation.
translation.ja: だが平和な時だけでなく

translation.en: Scaling this mountain is gonna take a lot of old-fashioned elbow grease.
translation.ja: 山を登るには 試練の時も経験する

translation.en: But I have faith that God is watching and he will reward our hard work.
translation.ja: だが神は その試練に 報いてくれるはずだ

translation.en: And if it be his will,
translation.ja: 神のご意思なら―

translation.en: Jaden and I will find that old whitetail we've been looking for.
translation.ja: 俺たちは必ず あのシカを見つける

translation.en: If my calculations are correct,
translation.ja: 俺の計算が正しければ―

translation.en: our non-typical is on the other side of this hill.
translation.ja: レアジカは ここの反対側にいる

translation.en: What if we get there and don't find anything?
translation.ja: 見つけられなかったら？

translation.en: It will be there, but if we're gonna make it, we can't be negative.
translation.ja: 大丈夫さ だがマイナス思考は禁物だ

translation.en: It'll be a hard climb. You wanna get that deer, this is what we gotta do.
translation.ja: 登りはキツいが狩りのためだ

translation.en: I gotta say, this deer really isn't a top priority for me anymore.
translation.ja: シカ狩りなんて どっちでもいいけどね

translation.en: Basically, I'm good if we don't kill the deer.
translation.ja: 別に殺さなくていい

translation.en: Ain't like it's gonna affect my life in some significant way.
translation.ja: 人生が 激変するわけじゃないし

translation.en: Of course it will.
translation.ja: 変わるさ

translation.en: The reason we're out here is so you can shoot a deer. How else are you gonna love hunting, huh?
translation.ja: シカを射止めれば 狩りが好きになるだろ？

translation.en: Oh, we're way past me loving hunting.
translation.ja: もう狩りなんて興味ない

translation.en: Why don't you go up there and kill the deer,
translation.ja: １人で行けば？ 僕は待ってるよ

translation.en: -and I'll chill here? -You listen to me.
translation.ja: １人で行けば？ 僕は待ってるよ よく聞け

translation.en: We are gonna finish this thing, okay?
translation.ja: ２人でやり遂げるんだ

translation.en: I don't care if I have to drag you up this mountain myself.
translation.ja: 引きずってでも連れてくぞ

translation.en: -Come on. -Please kill me now.
translation.ja: 立て もう死にたい

translation.en: -Come on. Now. -Fine.
translation.ja: 早くしろ 分かったよ

translation.en: Jaden! Come on! Let's go!
translation.ja: ジェイデン　行くぞ ほら

translation.en: [Buck] Beautiful!
translation.ja: きれいだ

translation.en: Oh, Dad! Dad, look! Look.
translation.ja: パパ　見てよ あそこ！

translation.en: Jaden, get your rifle ready. Come on.
translation.ja: ジェイデン　銃を

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: 急げ

translation.en: [exhales] I'll get to finish this video after all.
translation.ja: これで撮ろう

translation.en: Don took the Sony, but this little deal is full 1080p, and will work in a pinch.
translation.ja: カメラはこれしかないが 十分 高性能だ

translation.en: Oh, you look good in HD, Jaden.
translation.ja: カメラ映りがいいな

translation.en: My Lord, that is one gorgeous non-typical whitetail. [exhales deeply]
translation.ja: すごい　立派なオジロジカだ

translation.en: Right. This is the moment we've been waiting for, son. Are you ready?
translation.ja: 待ちに待った瞬間だぞ 撃てるか？

translation.en: [Jaden] Oh, hell, yeah.
translation.ja: 任せといて

translation.en: Now, remember, control your breathing.

translation.en: All right, when you're ready...

translation.en: take the shot.
translation.ja: 引き金を引け

translation.en: What's the matter? Is your gun jammed?
translation.ja: どうした？　故障か？

translation.en: I'm gonna wait for it to turn around, get a cleaner shot that way.
translation.ja: 後ろを向いたほうが 命中しやすい

translation.en: Oh, no, don't wait. Take him now.
translation.ja: 待たずに撃て

translation.en: I don't wanna injure him. Isn't that what you always say?
translation.ja: 即死させたい パパの教えだろ

translation.en: Go ahead and injure him. He'll have plenty of time to bleed out while we go down there and get him.
translation.ja: 即死じゃなくても 失血死でいい

translation.en: Trust me. Just take the damn shot already.
translation.ja: いいから さっさと撃て

translation.en: Okay, okay, relax.
translation.ja: 分かったよ

translation.en: Take the shot. Take the shot.
translation.ja: 撃て ほら 早く

translation.en: What are you looking at me for? Look at the deer!
translation.ja: 俺じゃなくてシカを見ろ！

translation.en: Take the shot. Come on, there you go.
translation.ja: 撃て ほら 今だ

translation.en: [loudly] Take the shot!
translation.ja: 早く撃て！

translation.en: Oh! No, he's running. Get him!
translation.ja: 逃げるぞ　早く撃て

translation.en: He's running! Right over there! Get him! Shoot, Jaden!
translation.ja: あそこだ　撃て 撃つんだ　ジェイデン

translation.en: Shit, it's Don! What the hell? You shot Don!
translation.ja: ドンだ ドンを撃ったぞ

translation.en: -[Don groaning] Oh, shit! -Oh, no.
translation.ja: 何てこった

translation.en: -I gotta go out there and help him. -[gasps]
translation.ja: マズいぞ あいつを助けないと

translation.en: Jaden, no! No!
translation.ja: ジェイデン　待て！

translation.en: -[Don] Oh, I got popped in the leg. -Don?
translation.ja: 足を撃たれた ドン

translation.en: Oh, Buck. Buck, is that you?
translation.ja: バック バック　お前か？

translation.en: -I'm not doing good. -[Buck] I see you, buddy.
translation.ja: 死にそうだ 大丈夫だ

translation.en: Hey, Jaden.
translation.ja: よう ジェイデン

translation.en: Here we are, Don.
translation.ja: ドン　来たぞ

translation.en: Put your head up a little bit.
translation.ja: 少し頭を上げて

translation.en: -Here we are, buddy. -Oh, it's bad. It's bad.
translation.ja: 踏ん張れよ もうダメだ 止血するからな

translation.en: I'll make a tourniquet. Hang in there.
translation.ja: 止血するからな ジェイデン 見事 大当たりだ

translation.en: You're a good shot, Jaden. You got me good.
translation.ja: ジェイデン 見事 大当たりだ

translation.en: Hang in there. What the hell were you doing up here?
translation.ja: 何でこんな所にいたんだ

translation.en: I couldn't leave till we finished that video.
translation.ja: 撮影を終わらせないと

translation.en: Besides, who else knows which angles make you look younger?
translation.ja: お前を若く撮れるのは 俺だけだ

translation.en: Ow! That's too tight! Put your finger inside of it.
translation.ja: キツく縛りすぎだ

translation.en: We gotta stop the bleeding so we can get you out of here.
translation.ja: しっかり止血しないと

translation.en: Put your finger on to make the wound stop mashing.
translation.ja: それじゃ傷口がつぶれる

translation.en: [Buck] Hang in there.
translation.ja: 我慢しろ

translation.en: Don? Don. Come on, stay with me, Don.
translation.ja: ドン　おい 目を覚ませ　ドン

translation.en: Stay with me. Come on, buddy.
translation.ja: 目を覚ませ　ドン

translation.en: Is he dead?
translation.ja: 死んだの？

translation.en: Hey, Mom, you got that pretty dress on.
translation.ja: 母さん　そのドレス…

translation.en: We gotta get him out of here. Come on.
translation.ja: こいつを運ぶぞ

translation.en: -Ready? Bring him up. -Yeah.

translation.en: [grunts] There you go. Don, ready? One, two, three.

translation.en: [Buck] All right, come on.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: [Don] Put me down. Put me down.
translation.ja: 降ろしてくれ

translation.en: -Put me down. -[Buck] All right. Get him down.

translation.en: Good night, my special son.
translation.ja: おやすみ　坊や

translation.en: We're never gonna get Don out of these mountains.
translation.ja: 下山させるのはムリだ

translation.en: Sorry, Dad. Sorry for shooting Don.

translation.en: Oh, Jaden, it's not your fault.
translation.ja: お前のせいじゃない

translation.en: Yes, it is. I can't do anything without messing it up.

translation.en: I failed at hunting just like I failed at school.
translation.ja: 学校でも狩りでも落ちこぼれ

translation.en: I don't need an extra year to grow and I'm not a visual learner.
translation.ja: 視覚から 学ぶタイプでもないし

translation.en: What you all talking about? I'm bleeding... bleeding out.
translation.ja: 何の話だ？ 血だ　血が出てる

translation.en: This just proves it.
translation.ja: これで分かった

translation.en: I'm just not smart.
translation.ja: 僕は賢くない

translation.en: I'm stupid, Dad.
translation.ja: バカなんだよ

translation.en: Don't you ever talk about yourself like that.
translation.ja: 自分を悪く言うんじゃない

translation.en: I don't ever wanna hear those words come out of your mouth again.
translation.ja: 二度と口にするなよ

translation.en: Yes, sir.
translation.ja: はい

translation.en: Y'all just keep talking, I'm bleeding.
translation.ja: おしゃべりに出血…

translation.en: [Buck] If there's anybody stupid here, it's me.
translation.ja: バカなのは俺だ

translation.en: We should've turned back a long time ago.
translation.ja: 引き返していれば…

translation.en: I wanted you to kill that non-typical so bad,
translation.ja: お前のシカ狩りに こだわって―

translation.en: I didn't care what I had to do.
translation.ja: 判断を誤ったんだ

translation.en: I thought if you loved hunting, it could be something we could do together,

translation.en: 'cause I'm not living with you anymore and I don't get to see you that much.
translation.ja: 別々に暮らしてるし― 頻繁には会えない

translation.en: I was just hoping there would be a way that...
translation.ja: 欲しかったんだ　お前と…

translation.en: I could always be in your life.
translation.ja: 一緒にいられる理由が

translation.en: But you don't need a reason to be in my life.
translation.ja: 理由なんて要らないよ

translation.en: You're my father.
translation.ja: 僕の父親だろ

translation.en: What y'all doing over there? Having a sandwich?

translation.en: [Buck] I don't know what to do.
translation.ja: どうしたらいいんだ

translation.en: Can't carry him out of here. Need a helicopter or a damn stretcher.

translation.en: How about an air mattress?
translation.ja: エアマットレスは？

translation.en: [chuckles] Jaden...
translation.ja: ジェイデン

translation.en: You, son...
translation.ja: お前…

translation.en: are a damn genius.
translation.ja: 天才だな

translation.en: Come on.
translation.ja: 始めよう 山を下りようぜ　クソ野郎

translation.en: We got you. Gonna hop on there, we start downstream.
translation.ja: 乗ったら流れに任せる

translation.en: It's gonna be rough as hell. Okay?
translation.ja: かなり急だ

translation.en: Hold on to him and stay on this mattress best you can.
translation.ja: ドンを支えろ 自分も落ちるなよ

translation.en: -You understand? -Don't worry, I got it.
translation.ja: 分かってる

translation.en: You doing all right there, Don?
translation.ja: 大丈夫か？　ドン

translation.en: Good enough. Ready, son?
translation.ja: よし　行くぞ

translation.en: I was born ready.
translation.ja: 任せといて

translation.en: All right. Don't get wet.
translation.ja: 落ちるなよ

translation.en: Let's go.
translation.ja: 行こう

translation.en: [Don] Oh, waterbed.
translation.ja: ウォーターベッドだ

translation.en: Oh, hell, yeah.
translation.ja: 行くぞ

translation.en: [Buck] Watch out. Paddle, paddle, paddle.

translation.en: These rapids aren't so bad, maybe class two.

translation.en: They're bad enough. Just be careful.
translation.ja: 十分 急だ　油断するな

translation.en: I've seen bigger waves in a toilet bowl.
translation.ja: トイレ流したほうが急だ

translation.en: Jaden, Jaden, Jaden, hold on. Yeah!

translation.en: There we go. Hold on to the rope. Hold on to the rope.
translation.ja: 来るぞ ロープにつかまれ しっかりな

translation.en: Now, these look like class three.
translation.ja: これでクラス３くらいだ

translation.en: Making me faint.
translation.ja: 気絶しそうだ

translation.en: What's happening?
translation.ja: どうした？

translation.en: You ready? Well, come on, let's go.
translation.ja: 平気か？ よし　行くぞ

translation.en: [Buck] Hold on to the rope!
translation.ja: つかまれ！

translation.en: Doing good, son. Hold on tight!
translation.ja: その調子だ　落ちるなよ

translation.en: Hold on for a little bit longer!
translation.ja: もう少しだぞ

translation.en: -Brutal! -Hold on!
translation.ja: これ ヤバい ドンを押さえろ

translation.en: [Buck] We did good, son. We did good.
translation.ja: よくやった　ジェイデン

translation.en: You're all right. You're all right.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だな すごいぞ

translation.en: -[Jaden] Are you okay, Don? -Yeah, I feel good.
translation.ja: ドン　平気？ ああ　大丈夫だ

translation.en: I really appreciate this valiant effort to save me.
translation.ja: ２人の勇気に感謝してる

translation.en: Oh, this sounds like a biggie.
translation.ja: すごいのが来るぞ

translation.en: -All right, come on, paddle, paddle. -Let's just go to the shore.
translation.ja: ジェイデン　漕げ 一難去ってまた…

translation.en: [Buck] We can do this, son. Here we go.
translation.ja: 絶対 乗り切るからな

translation.en: -Oh, my God, here's the big one! -Oh, Jesus.
translation.ja: これはデカいぞ 神様

translation.en: [Buck] Here we go! Hang on, Jaden!
translation.ja: 落とされるなよ

translation.en: Hold on to the rope!
translation.ja: つかまれ

translation.en: Hold on!
translation.ja: 踏ん張れ

translation.en: -My rifle! -[Buck] No, Jaden!
translation.ja: 僕の銃が！ やめろ

translation.en: Jaden, no!
translation.ja: ジェイデン！

translation.en: Dad!
translation.ja: パパ

translation.en: -Dad! -Jaden!
translation.ja: パパ！ ジェイデン！

translation.en: Hold on, son!
translation.ja: 今 行くぞ

translation.en: Grab my hand! Grab my hand!
translation.ja: つかまれ！

translation.en: I got you. Hold on. I got you.
translation.ja: よし　もう大丈夫だ

translation.en: [Jaden] But my rifle.
translation.ja: でも銃が

translation.en: [Buck] Let it go, son. Let it go.
translation.ja: いいんだ 諦めろ

translation.en: Dad. I wanna play you a song I've been working on.
translation.ja: パパ 僕の作った曲 聞いて

translation.en: I'd love to hear it. You wrote a song?
translation.ja: ああ　作ったのか？

translation.en: It's not perfect. Here it goes.
translation.ja: まだ完璧じゃないけど

translation.en: ♪ In the mirror, in the mirror ♪
translation.ja: 鏡の中に見えるのは

translation.en: ♪ It's my face I see ♪
translation.ja: 僕の顔

translation.en: ♪ But it's my father's Yeah, my father's ♪
translation.ja: でも そこには 　　父さんもいる

translation.en: ♪ Staring back at me ♪
translation.ja: 僕を見つめ返す父さんが

translation.en: Hold on. I'm gonna start over.
translation.ja: 最初からやり直す

translation.en: ♪ My father was a hunter ♪
translation.ja: 父さんはハンター

translation.en: ♪ And I was his son ♪
translation.ja: 僕は息子

translation.en: ♪ My father was a hunter ♪
translation.ja: 父さんはハンター

translation.en: ♪ And I was his son ♪
translation.ja: 僕は息子

translation.en: ♪ My father was a hunter ♪
translation.ja: 父さんはハンター

translation.en: ♪ And I was his son ♪
translation.ja: 僕は息子

translation.en: ♪ I was his son ♪
translation.ja: 父さんの息子

translation.en: Where are we?
translation.ja: ここはどこだ？

translation.en: You're almost out of here, buddy.
translation.ja: じき ふもとだ

translation.en: -Hey, Buck. -Yeah?
translation.ja: バック 何だ

translation.en: Thank you for saving my life.
translation.ja: よく助けてくれた

translation.en: You'd do the same for me.
translation.ja: 当然だろ

translation.en: The only reason I was gonna retire was because I thought you didn't care about me.
translation.ja: お前が俺に無関心で リタイアまで考えたが―

translation.en: I guess if you saved my life, you do.
translation.ja: 助けたってことは違うんだな

translation.en: I was wrong, Buck, when I said you were alone.
translation.ja: 俺が間違ってた お前は独りじゃない

translation.en: You're not alone. You always got old Don.
translation.ja: 俺が間違ってた お前は独りじゃない このドンがいる

translation.en: -I know I do, buddy. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: 分かってるさ

translation.en: All right, well, we only got one four-wheeler.
translation.ja: バギーは１台しかない

translation.en: Well, what am I supposed to do? Sit here all alone in the woods, totally bored?
translation.ja: 僕をここで待たせるの？ そんなの退屈だよ

translation.en: No, sir. I want you to take this four-wheeler,
translation.ja: お前がドンを 管理所まで送って―

translation.en: drive Don to Cherokee Mountain Outfitters and get him an ambulance,
translation.ja: 救急車を呼べ

translation.en: -but under one condition. -What?
translation.ja: ただし条件がある 何？

translation.en: You have to drive fast as hell.
translation.ja: ぶっ飛ばして行け

translation.en: Good, 'cause that's how I do my best driving, anyway.
translation.ja: よかった　僕の得意技だ

translation.en: Don't forget to send someone back to get me.
translation.ja: パパの救助も忘れるな

translation.en: I won't forget you.
translation.ja: 忘れないよ

translation.en: Bye, Dad.
translation.ja: じゃあね　パパ

translation.en: Bye, son.
translation.ja: ああ　ジェイデン
